text: Atahpara tadera [1] angikara bhangera jan'ya amara taderake laâ€™nata karechi o tadera hrdaya kathina karechi; tara sabdaguloke apana sthana thekai bikrta kare ebam taderake ye upadesa deya hayechila tara ekansa tara bhule geche. Ara apani sabasamaya tadera alpa sankhyaka chara sakalake'i bisbasaghatakata karate dekhate pabena [2], kaje'i taderake ksama karuna ebam upeksa karuna. Niscaya'i allaha muhasinaderake bhalobasena
